runs.comm: full on off, Atkinson shimmies out and bunts it towards mid-on
full and outside off, poked to third man. The call was for two, Atkinson may have twisted his leg while turning back. He is hobbling. They have to settle with one
hurled full on off, blocked to cover
short and angled down leg, brushes the thigh and wanders behind square
Panyangara hits a back of a length outside off, punched to short cover
full and angled into the pads, turned to midwicket
short and just outside off, nearly dragged on. He cuts and gets an inside edge that whizzes past the stumps
short ball, does not climb much. Mis-hits a pull, it only trickles towards midwicket
back of a length, ducks in to ping the pad, but this was heading down leg
another nip-backer, the batsman manages to squirt it out off an inside edge
tucked off the hips through midwicket
full and bends in to catch the pad, heading down again
short and on the leg stump, but does not get up. Off the pad and dribbles behind square
short and outside off, Campbell throws his hands at the ball, chopped to short cover
bouncer , Campbell was through the pull early. Thuds into the chest and lobs up, getting stuck in the grille of the helmet
leg-stump short ball, Campbell connects with the pull. Helped behind square
back of a length and outside off, Campbell aims to force it past the covers, ends up sending an inside edge to the leg side
short ball on off, swivels on the back foot and pulls it behind square, one-bounce four
impressive incutter, prodded to the leg side
Chatara goes wide of the crease and angles it outside off from over the wicket. Campbell sits back. Pulls and does not make contact
width outside off, crunched to cover
back of a length and kicks up outside off, jabbed to point
quick short ball, spoons a pull to the left of short fine leg off the top half of the bat
short and angled in, gets on top of the bounce and plays it back to the bowler

Campbell struggles for timing, falls for 9 off 19 balls. He steps out to meet a short ball. 110ks. He can only drag it to Hamilton at mid-on. Bad day out with the bat on return. Tiripano has his hands aloft
short and nips back in off the deck to hit the thigh pad
short and outside off, swings hard, swings early, and drags it behind square off a thick inside edge
length and outside off, pushed to cover. Raza dives to his right and makes a smart save
back of a length, top-of-off line, played back to the bowler
shortish on off, defended back to the bowler. Ntini, Zim's bowling consultant, applauds Tiripano's successful over
Atkinson dances out, this is darted short and down leg, deflected behind to the keeper
rising short ball outside off, Atkinson does well to get on top of the bounce and control the pull. Struck in front of square
extra bounce, short ball outside off, calmly tapped towards cover
Atkinson steps out and gets outside the line of off, the ball hits the pad and runs away behind square
keeps it short on off, blocked back to the bowler
back of a length and angled in, blocked back to the bowler
slides on with the arm outside off, dabbed to short third man
flat and quick at 89ks, goes low for a sweep, hits it flat. Sibanda misjudges it at deep midwicket. He overran to his right, half-attempted the catch with his right-hand and allowed a four
guided to short third man
pushed through on middle, clipped behind square
down the track and whipped to long-on, keeps it to one
the batsman uses his feet, this is darted short. Bunted towards midwicket
pushed through outside off, no real turn, patted to cover. The fielder attacks the ball by rushing in but fumbles
drifts in and turns a bit, opens the face and runs it towards short third man
down the track and flicks a couple in the gap at midwicket
use of the feet again, secures a single to long-on
Atkinson dances down the track again, meets the pitch and launches it over long-off for a maximum
slides in with the arm, blocked to short cover

Wellington strikes and roars! This snakes in with the arm on middle, Hayat drops to one knee, but can't connect with a sweep. Hong Kong fall behind further. The tracker shows that it would have crashed into middle and leg
he uses his feet right away, jams it back to the bowler
short on middle, pulled away behind square
full on middle, knocked to midwicket with soft hands
Chapman skips back and jabs this quicker one to mid-on
pushed to midwicket
nudged towards square leg
full on middle, whipped to the right of short midwicket, the fielder dives and takes some pace off the ball
Atkinson steps out, the length is shortened. Hit on the pad
down the track and driven to long-off
slides on middle, kept out
heading down leg, Chapman aims to sweep. Instead, takes it on the pad
Atkinson jumps down the track again, but Wellington shortens his length a bit and catches the pad
and again! Atkinson uses his feet, does not meet the pitch, but squirts a single to leg
looped up and outside off, Chapman gallops down the track now, goes over the short cover fielder. He leaps but the ball bursts through to the boundary
slides on middle, down the track and slugged over midwicket
Chapmal uses his feet again and laces it to cover
he now brings out a reverse sweep and finds short third man
full on middle from round the wicket, pushed back
down the track and whipped in front of square
Atkinson skips out again, this is fired shorter, takes the pad and runs towards cover
shot! Chapman dances out and drills it over the bowler's head. Long-on moves to his right and lets the ball through him
drifting down leg, Chapman can't scoop it away
off-side wide
dragged to the leg side off the inside half
full on off, may have been an offuctter, turned through midwicket
down the track, Panyangara pulls his length back and beats the batsman
length ball on off, guided towards point
back of a length and outside off, whipped towards midwicket
down the track, yorks himself, and pushes to long-off
slower ball outside off, Chapman makes room and cuts past cover
down the track, the bowler hits the pad. Atkinson, however, hares across for a single. He dives full stretch
Chapman holes out off a full toss. Ntini is up on his feet, he is pumped. Chapman steps out and manufactures a full toss. Slogged to deep midwicket. Sibanda makes no mistake here, running to his left
back of a length on middle from round the wicket, punched to long-on
looped up and drifts in, stabbed behind square off the inside edge
down the track, gets a full toss. The bat twists in Atkinson's hands as he slices it down the ground
faster one, fizzes off the surface and raps the pad, but this was going down leg
Atkinson steps out, swings and misses, the ball beats the bat, the leg stump, and Mutumbami as well
down the track, reaches out and carves it behind point
Atkinson steps away outside leg, this slides in short with the arm. Swatted to long-on
full toss down the leg side, helped past short fine leg
short and down leg, pulled behind square
drifts in short as the batsman comes down the track, guided to short fine leg off the pads
slower ball following the batsman outside leg, squirted onto the thigh off an inside edge
dug in short and outside off, Atkinson frees his arms. He mauls a pull over midwicket
Atkinson raises his fifty with a boundary, his first in T20Is. Chatara turns to the slower one. Full on middle, Atkinson spots it and crunches it down the ground
full toss, surprises the batsman. Mis-hit down the ground
full at the base of off, jabbed back to the bowler
full and outside off, shuffles across and laps it deftly over short fine leg
full and outside off, makes room and slices it to third man. A fumble in the deep gifts an extra run

Hamilton looks relieved. Ntini claps. He has been belting out his encouragement all through the chase. Slower full ball on off, Atkinson gets elevation but not the desired distance. Swings and finds long-on. Williams completes the overhead catch. Atkinson tosses his head back in despair
full and outside off, picked up over midwicket
full and outside off, Tanwir clears his front leg and lifts it over extra cover
full and outside off, sliced hit over mid-off
slower full ball outside off, the batsman opens the face of the bat and carves it over backward point
slower short ball outside off, the batsman in early into the leg-side swing and misses. Panyangara collapses in his followthrough
bouncer outside off, steps out, but can't put bat on ball
back of a length on off, belted fiercely to cow corner, Walkker moves to his left from deep midwicket, stops it with his left hand
lifting short ball outside off, Tanwir can't touch it
full on middle, the bowler misses his length, misses the yorker. Tanwir clears his front leg and sends it skimming over long-on

another mishap in the field, Chigumbura drops this at backward point. Full and outside off, Tanwir throws his hands at it, carving it in the air. Chigumbura makes a mess of this. He leaps off his feet, gets both hands to the ball, but spills it
full and wide outside off, squeezed past the covers
Rath manufactures room outside leg, Tiripano does well to follow him. The batsman goes for a lofted hit, but ends up plopping a catch to cover
two wickets in two balls. Full and slanting away outside off with the angle from round the stumps. Nizakat dismissed for a golden duck. He slices it to Tirpano at third man
beamer, full toss above the waistline, hit over midwicket, one-bounce four
full and outside off, the batsman flits around in the crease and slices it over cover
yorker outside off, can't be dug out
full and angling away outside off, flirts with the wide line and gets away. Aizaz slashes and misses
knee-high full toss, weak flick behind square off the inside edge
floats a back of the hand slower ball down leg, brushes the pad on its way to the keeper
shortish and outside off, wild swipe and a miss. Might have been another slower ball. Ntini is up on his feet, applauding
full and attacks the pad, he can't flick it away
back of a length on middle, skies a slog in front of on-rushing long-on
yorker shading towards the leg stump, squeezed fine on the leg side for four. Zimbabwe open their WT20 campaign with a win
